title: The Water must go somewhere
creator_credit: Graham Chase, Roan Hannam, Malcolm Otton and Film Australia
brief_description: Illustrates the advance-warning techniques associated with flooding. Also shows methods of evacuation, and consequences of not following evacuation orders. Gives some criticism of the practice of building in areas where flooding is inevitable. Uses actual film footage shot during floods in Richmond, New South Wales.
creator_credit_for_label: Graham Chase, Roan Hannam, Malcolm Otton and Film Australia
